OOC: Ah, Orchid is very helpful...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 13, 2001 11:1=
0 PM
  Subject: Re: Iron Fist


  OOC: I copied and pasted Kyle Stewart's p=
ost below. I marked it with red and bold.


  _____________________________=
_________________


  My messages haven't been getting through so:

  1.Mus=
tex and Stallex
  Location:Northern Chad
  Status:Traveling
  Destination:E=
gypt
  ETA:22 hours

   Mustex and Stallex duel. Their double-bladed swords=

  slice the air. It is
  sparring, but one mistake still means death. Stal=
lex
  is by far the more
  talented fighter, but he can not match his fathe=
r in
  strength and speed, so
  Mustex continues pushing Stallex back. Must=
ex gets a
  good blow to Stallex's
  chest. Stallex buckles under the pain.=

  Mustex:Why did you stop?
  Stallex:It hurts.
  Mustex:Don't stop. If you=
 don't give into the pain it
  will hurt 10 times
  more. If you give into =
the pain you're enemy will see
  that it hurts 100 times
  more. I've seen =
alot of bots fall from that mistake.
  Alot of bots wouldn't
  have bothere=
d teaching you that. Now back to beast
  mode.
  Stallex:Beast Mode!
  Must=
ex:Beast Mode!
  Stallex:Internal repairs.
   They begin to run off. The tw=
o horses run quickly
  over the desert.
  Stallex:What's our next mission.
=
  Mustex:Yours is in "Training City". There's a monkey
  there named Rhesus=
. He's
  an old friend and he can teach you about stealth.
  Stallex:What a=
bout you?
  Mustex:I have a plan to take out the "Iron Fist", but
  it's a =
1 bot job.
  Stallex:You know how dangerous that is.
  Mustex:Yes but  it's=
 even harder for 2 bots to
  infiltrate. I have a shot
  alone though.
  St=
allex:O.k., but come back alive. I want to be the
  one to beat you.
   The=
y run off on their way to Egypt.

  2.Mustex and Stallex
  Location:Trainin=
g City,Egypt
  Status:Preparation

   Mustex and Stallex walk into a room. =
Rhesus is
  sitting at a desk with his
  back to them. He is leaning over s=
ome circuits
  examining them. Mustex has his
  hands behind his back and i=
s wearing his poker face.
  He knows the following
  conversation will be a=
 simple matter of wearing down
  Rhesus who is completely
  oblivious to th=
em.
  Mustex:Rhesus!
   Rhesus jumps. Mustex walks around in front of him.
=
  Mustex:Still wasting precious Maximal computer space
  on your own privat=
e
  casino my,my,my. Stallex go start training with
  drones,Rhesus will be=
 with
  you soon.
   Stallex walks out.
  Rhesus:Ahh,my good friend. So the=
 "Carnitrons" rise
  again. I can hear the cry
  "Carnitrons Carnivate". We=
 were the only sensible
  group. We had a simple
  motto of "stay alive".
 =
 Mustex:Shutup! If we were so great then why did I lead
  us to get ambushe=
d by
  the "Alliance" for our first battle. As I recall 5 of
  the 7 of us =
were
  damaged beyond repair. Now I see that anything except
  a 2-way war =
leads to
  extra senseless casulties. That's why I intend to make
  everyon=
e pick Maximal
  or Predicon. All you can think about is revenge on the
  "=
Alliance",and the
  rebirth of a lost cause. All I want is these parts and
=
  a transport.
   Mustex hands Rhesus a paper. Rhesus looks upset as he
  r=
eads it.
  Rhesus:Where am I going to get a D.N.A. simulator.
  Mustex:You'=
re a bigger fool than I thought if you
  think I don't know where
  Fox Fin=
gers got his.
  Rhesus:Even so it will take me several weeks, but pay
  cou=
ld speed me up.
  Mustex:Did I mention I'm planning to take out the
  "Iron=
 Fist" the Alliance
  will be permantly crippled.
  Rhesus:Well in that cas=
e just let me step into the
  next toom to get what you
  need. So,we can f=
inally get revenge for Croctas,
  Kangato, Tigecs, Socrow, and
  my lovely =
Monkessa. I've just finished about half a
  dozen special
  hover-cycles. T=
hey should do fine for you.
  Mustex:Oh, and by the way I told my son you'd=
 train
  him.
  Rhesus:Small price to pay. Does he know about the
  "Carnit=
rons" yet.
  Mustex:Not a clue.
  Rhesus:Don't worry I won't snich 'till yo=
u come to
  your senses.
   Rhesus hands Mustex a large box of parts and wa=
lks
  away to train Stallex.

  3.Mustex
  Location:Training City,Egypt
  S=
tatus:Traveling
  Destination:Alliance Island,Spain
  ETA:5 hours

  Rhesus=
:Come back alive. You know I can't restart the
  "Carnitrons" without
  you=
.
  Mustex:You're not going to resart them with or without
  me.
  Rhesus:I=
'll take good care of the kid... Uh,that is
  until you get back.
  Mustex:=
bye
   Mustex jumps onto his waiting hover-cycle and races
  off.

  4.Must=
ex
  Location:Alliance Island, Spain
  Status:Infiltration

   Mustex looks=
 at the newly completed drone in front of
  him. He activates
  the D.N.A. =
simulator. The drone takes on his
  appearance. He is positioned 500
  yard=
s from the "Iron Fist" so the Alliance won't risk
  an attack unless he
  g=
ets closer. He activates another pocket sized drone.
  It begins its missio=
n
  to plant a device he had built 100 yards from the
  base, 40 feet under=
. When
  his monitor says the drone is done he calls out the
  code that wi=
ll activate
  the drones programming.
  Mustex:Beast Mode!
   Mustex turns =
on his jammer and attaches it to his
  belt. The drone begins
  transmittin=
g a Maximal  frequency,goes to Beast
  Mode,and bounds for the base.
  Must=
ex keeps low to the ground so he won't be spotted.
  The auto-guns begin
  =
firing, but no transformers come out. The horse jumps
  away from every sho=
t.
  He stops at 100 yards away.
  Drone:Mustex Maximize!
   The drone tran=
sforms and begins firing arrows at the
  shield of the base. He
  dodges al=
l the beams,but only has enough power at this
  kind of level for 15
  minu=
tes. Fortunately,he doesn't need that long. The
  main turrets fireand take=

  him out. The shields flicker from power loss,but stay
  intact. Mustex t=
hen
  smiles when his monitor shows the pocket sized drone
  the pocket siz=
ed drone
  has reached the surface. He activates the device and
  it transm=
ites a Maximal
  frequency. The drone then starts firing. It has enough
  p=
ower for 6 shots. The
  "Alliance" is beginning to sweat. The main turret
 =
 fires again and the shield
  goes down. Mustex deactivates th device and c=
harges.
  Mustex:Beast Mode!
   As he charges he scans the base. The shield=
s will be
  down for the next hour.
  It will be down for the next hour. It=
 will take him 10
  minutes to navigate
  the corridors to his destination =
and 10 minutes to get
  back. He will go in
  the  one way they won't expec=
t,The Front Door, 10
  yards away he transforms.
  Mustex:Mustex Maximize!
=
   Mustex draws a cyber arrow and blows the door open.
  Using his frequenc=
y
  jammer as cover he sneaks to his destination. He walks
  into the Energ=
on
  storage room. The Energon will magnify the explosion
  of the small ex=
plosive
  he made. He walks over to a computer console and hooks
  it up to=
 the
  "Alliance" network. If a remote connection is placed
  on it it will=
 blow from
  2 connections to the network. It can detect the
  Energon and =
will blow if much
  is removed. It can detect the energon in the room and
 =
 will blow if to much is
  removed. It takes 20 minutes to diffuse and it w=
ould
  be set for 15. There is
  no deactivation code. The full blast could=
 probably
  not be contained. Even if
  the explosive is covered an electro=
nic signal will
  ignite the energon. He set
  it and ran out.

           =
   CHECK! Your move Zardus(feel free to
               head for your time m=
achine this
                qualifies as a catastophe).
